tool_description: The image composition aesthetic scoring ability can score the composition aesthetics of the input image. The higher the score, the better the composition effect.
name: Composition Aesthetics Score
title: Composition Aesthetics Score

api_list.name: Composition Aesthetics Score

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description:
- **Image format**: `JPG` `JPEG` `BMP` `PNG` `WEBP`
- **Image size**: No more than 3 MB.
- **Image resolution**: Larger than 32x32px, smaller than 4096x4096px.
